roleset.name: measures the electrical activity of the heart

example.text: PACs and PVCs noted on pre-op ECG.
example.amr: (n / note-01 :ARG1 (a / and :op1 (d / disease-disorder :pl + :name (n2 / name :op1 "PAC") :ARG2-of (h / have-disorder-91)) :op2 (d2 / disease-disorder :pl + :name (n3 / name :op1 "PVC") :ARG2-of (h2 / have-disorder-91))) :instrument (e / electrocardiogram-01 :ARG2 a :ARG1-of (p / preop-01)))
